name: animated-beam
description: An animated beam of light which travels along a path.

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes for the SVG element

props.name: containerRef
props.description: Ref to the container element for positioning

props.name: fromRef
props.description: Ref to the element where the beam starts

props.name: toRef
props.description: Ref to the element where the beam ends

props.name: reverse
props.description: Whether to reverse the beam animation direction

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration of the beam animation in seconds

props.name: delay
props.description: Delay before the animation starts in seconds

props.name: pathColor
props.description: Color of the static beam path

props.name: pathWidth
props.description: Width of the beam path stroke

props.name: pathOpacity
props.description: Opacity of the static beam path

props.name: gradientStartColor
props.description: Starting color of the animated gradient

props.name: gradientStopColor
props.description: Ending color of the animated gradient

props.name: startXOffset
props.description: Horizontal offset for the beam start position

props.name: startYOffset
props.description: Vertical offset for the beam start position

props.name: endXOffset
props.description: Horizontal offset for the beam end position

props.name: endYOffset
props.description: Vertical offset for the beam end position
